stories.title: Hacker claims to have stolen 1B records of Chinese citizens from police

stories.text:
Hi everyone,

I am a phd student in infosec and working on a paper covering multi-party cyber incidents (ripple events). the problem is the data. most of the white papers use advisen data but they are 'a little' hesitant to share/sell the data, given that I am just a student :)

VERIS (VCDB) database consists of all incidents. I can manually check every incident to see if there is any correlation between those events, but you know... this takes ages.

Do you have any other suggestions? I need the company name, threat (type) action, timeline, and which companies are impacted (the breach propagated).

Such that target breach propagated to companies x, y, and z in 2013 .
